title: RP Purchase, no RP gotten.
body:
Hey
So I've just tried to purchase RP (10 Euro) and I never got the RP on my account... Though I can see on my bank account that there's a payment waiting, which restricts me from using the money that is waiting. 
Can someone give some input to this? o.O - Cuz I am lost, and afraid to purchase RP at this very moment, in case of the old "possibly failed" transaction will charge my money too.
{{summoner:3}}

replies.body: Sometimes a relog might be needed to show your proper balance.  You may also need to wait for the transaction to finalize as well.  I did look into this for you, and it looks like your RP was received.  If this is still an issue, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team can take a look.
